===Overview===
'''Roxx News''' (officially Roxx News Channel and abbreviated RNC) is an American news channel. It is owned by [[Roxxon Energy Corporation (Earth-616)|Roxxon Energy Corporation]].

===Events===
The [[Dark Elves]], equipped with [[Roxxon Energy Corporation (Earth-616)|Roxxon]] artillery, went forth into the [[Light Elves]] home of [[Alfheim]], slaughtering every living creature.{{r|Mighty Thor Vol 3 1}} As a provocation towards [[Jane Foster (Earth-616)|Thor]], Light Elf bodies were projected in the sky of Midgard, inadvertently destroying Roxxon's [[Roxx News Storm-Tracking Space Station]].{{r|Mighty Thor Vol 3 1}}
